data.title: Catharine (Holloway) McCluskey (1836-1906)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Catharine (Holloway) McCluskey born 1836 Stoney Creek, Randolph County, Indiana, United States died 1906 Sidney Township, Fremont, Iowa, United States including ancestors + descendants + 1 photos + 1 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 3 Apr 2024 | Created 29 Apr 2017

This page has been accessed 304 times.

Biography

Catharine was born on 12 Apr 1836 in Stoney Creek, Indiana to Pleasant Holloway and Samaria Stanley. [1]

In the 1850 United States Federal Census[2] Catharine was living with her parents and siblings:

Pleasant Holloway, 55

Samaria Holloway, 55

John Holloway, 22

Susanna Holloway, 21

Hannah Holloway, 17

Abijah Holloway, 15

William Holloway, 10

Joana Holloway, 18

Catharine Holloway, 13

Catharine married twice. Her first husband, William Rowe died in 1861. They married 3 May 1853 in Huntington County, Indiana.[3] [4]

The 1856 Iowa State Census [5] shows them living between the family of her sister Alameda Rowe (husband David P.) and the family of William N. Rowe (70, CT, who has also lived in Iowa 9 yrs and is probably William's and David's father), in Scott, Fremont, Iowa:

William Rowe 20 M Ind Mar farmer resided Iowa 9 yrs

Catharine Rowe 20 F Ind Mar resided Iowa 3 yrs

Mary Rowe 2 F Iowa resided Iowa 2 yrs

Maria Rowe 0 F Iowa

The 1860 US Federal Census[6]shows her in William Rowe's household as his "wife" with their children in White Cloud, Iowa:

William Rowe, 25

Catharine Rowe, 22

Mary Rowe, 6

Maria Rowe, 4

W.H. Rowe, 3

Ada Rowe, 2

Lewis Rowe, 5 mos

After William's death, Catharine remarried to Andrew J. McCluskey on Dec. 30, 1861, in Fremont County, Iowa. [7]

In the 1870 US Federal Census,[8] Catharine is living with Andrew and her children, right between her brothers William and Abijah Holloway, in Marion Center, Marion County, Kansas. Her first five children were Rowe's but listed as McCluskey's. Andrew and Catharine also had new additions to the family included on the census:

Andrew McCluskey, 43

Catharine McCluskey, 45

Mary McCluskey, 16

Mariah (Maria) McCluskey, 14

William H. McCluskey, 13

Aid Eliza McCluskey, 12 (this is Ada Elizabeth Rowe - there was a transcription error)

James L. McCluskey, 10 (this is "Lewis", middle name, Rowe from the 1860 census)

Joseph E. McCluskey, 7

Susannah J. McCluskey, 6

Caroline McCluskey, 4

John Milton McCluskey, 3

Robert L. McCluskey, 2

Dal Matthew McCluskey, 2 mos

In the 1880 US Federal Census, [9] Catharine has moved back to Iowa - Plattville, Mills County - and is a widow again:

Catherine Mc Clusky Self Female 45 Indiana VA VA Wd kh cannot read or write

Caroline Mc Clusky Daughter Female 14 Iowa KY IN servant schl

Joseph Mc Clusky Son Male 17 Colorado KY IN laborer cannot read or write

Jennie Mc Clusky Daughter Female 16 Iowa KY IN servant schl

John M Mc Clusky Son Male 14 Iowa KY IN laborer schl cannot write

Robert Mc Clusky Son Male 9 Iowa KY IN schl

Matheu Mc Clusky Son Male 8 Iowa KY IN schl

Hannah Mc Clusky Daughter Female 7 Kansas KY IN schl

Lucy Mc Clusky Daughter Female 6 Kansas KY IN schl

George A Mc Clusky Son Male 4 Iowa KY IN

In the 1900 US Federal Census, [10] Catharine has moved again, to Swan Township Forsyth village, Taney County, Missouri, where only her youngest son is still at home, and her son, John, and family are right next door:

Catherine Mccluskey Head Female Apr 1836 64 Wd Indiana KY NY 16/14 farmer O F F

George Mccluskey Son Male Dec 1874 25 S Iowa KY IN farm laborer

next to

John Mccluskey Head Male Apr 1867 33 M/11 Iowa Kentucky Indiana

Ethie Mccluskey Wife Female Jun 1866 34 M/11 Iowa New York Penn 3/1

Janey Mccluskey Dau Female Mar 1895 5 Single Iowa Iowa Iowa

Catherine died August 1, 1906, in Sidney Twp, Fremont County, Iowa, only two weeks after her son, George died there, both of pneumonia. [11] Mother and son share a tombstone at Acord Cemetery in Sidney.

1st marriage to William Henry Rowe, had 7 children. 2nd marriage to Andrew Jackson McCluskey, had 9 kids.

Sources

↑ Holloway James Lafayette, Descendants of John Holloway (N.p.: n.p., 1989), p. 187.

↑ Ancestry.com. 1850 United States Federal Census, Census Place: Stony Creek, Randolph, Indiana; Roll: M432_168; Page: 10A; Image: 25. [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2009.

↑ Ancestry.com. Indiana, Marriage Index, 1800-1941 Index of Grooms Part II - Index of Brides; Book: B, Page: 166. [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2005.

↑ Indiana Marriages, 1811-2019 at familysearch.org: Name William Rowe Sex Male Spouse's Name Catherine Holliwell Spouse's Sex Female Officiator's Name Isaac Marriage Place Huntington Marriage License Date 03 May 1853 Marriage License Place Huntington, Indiana, United States Marriage License Place (Original) HUNTINGTON, Indiana, United States from the image: license and marriage same day; performed by Isaac Gooch, J. P.

↑ Ancestry.com, Iowa State Censuses database online, p. 882, 9/9

↑ Ancestry.com. 1860 United States Federal Census, Census Place: White Cloud, Mills, Iowa; Roll: M653_336; Page: 131; Family History Library Film: 803336. [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2009.

↑ Iowa, County Marriages, 1838-1934 at familysearch.org: Name: Andrew J Mcclusky Sex: Male Spouse's Name: Cathrine Row Mrs Spouse's Sex: Female Marriage Date: 30 Dec 1861 Marriage Place: , Fremont, Iowa, United States Page: 143 Digital Folder Number: 004707892 Microfilm Number: 001533770 Image Number: 00375

↑ Ancestry.com. 1870 United States Federal Census, Census Place: Center, Marion, Kansas; Roll: M593_438; Page: 286B; Image: 76425; Family History Library Film: 545937,[database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2009.

↑ Familysearch.org; ed 128. sht 6B, taken June 15th, 38/42

↑ Familysearch.org; ed 132, p. 97, sht 18B, taken June 24

↑ Iowa, Death Records, 1904-1951 at familysearch.org: Cathrine McCluskey died in Sidney, Fremont, Iowa on Aug 1, 1906 aged 75; no birth date given; female, white, widow; born in Indiana, father = John Holloway, no birth info, mother not listed nor birth place; cause = pneumonia of 10 days duration; burial at McKisick on Aug 3rd; no informant is listed.
